title: Love By Soup - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cooking   Disabilities   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Short Story
author: Shui Fu Shen Qing   谁赋深情
description:
This is a story about a naive girl and a handsome young man at a college campus.  

The young man is the star of the college soccer team.  

But, strangely, when he injures his hand, he has to sit out of the soccer matches.  

Is it possible that he is actually kicking the “hand ball”?>
